text: Dirk Copeland (born September 5, 1972) is an American former cyclist. He competed at the 1992 Summer Olympics and the 1996 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:American male cyclists Category:Olympic cyclists of the United States Category:Cyclists at the 1992 Summer Olympics Category:Cyclists at the 1996 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Los Angeles Category:Pan American Games medalists in cycling Category:Pan American Games silver medalists for the United States Category:American track cyclists Category:Cyclists at the 1991 Pan American Games
title: Dirk Copeland
